BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kParent = UISelf:GetParent():GetParent() if false == kParent:IsNil() then local kList = kParent:GetControl("SFRM_SELECT_ITEMTYPE_LIST") if false == kList:IsNil() then kList:Visible(true) end end

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local kList = UISelf:GetControl("LST_SELECT_TYPE") if false == kList:IsNil() then local kItem = kList:ListFirstItem() if false == kItem:IsNil() then SetJobSkillFilterSize(kSelf, kList, kItem) end end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local bCheck = UISelf:GetCheckState() if true == bCheck then LearnFilter_JobSkillItem(false) else LearnFilter_JobSkillItem(true) end

ICON.SCRIPT: local iSaveIdx = UISelf:GetControl("DMY_SAVEIDX"):GetCustomDataAsInt() if 0 ~= iSaveIdx then JobSkillItem3_SelectMakeItem(iSaveIdx) end

FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf kSelf:InitRenderModel("JS3_CREATE_ITEM_EFFECT", false, false) kSelf:AddRenderModelNIFByPath("JS3_CREATE_ITEM_EFFECT", "Success", "../Data/5_Effect/4_UI/ef_UImix_02_succ.nif", false, true) kSelf:SetRenderModelCameraZoomMinMax("JS3_CREATE_ITEM_EFFECT", -300, 300) kSelf:RenderModelCameraZoom("JS3_CREATE_ITEM_EFFECT", 210.0)

BUTTON.HOTKEY: if false==UISelf:IsDisable() then JobSkillItem3_DoActionCreateItem(UISelf:GetParent()) end return true

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kParent = UISelf:GetParent():GetParent() if false == kParent:IsNil() then local kList = kParent:GetControl("SFRM_SELECT_ITEMTYPE_LIST") if false == kList:IsNil() then kList:Visible(true) end end

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local kList = UISelf:GetControl("LST_SELECT_TYPE") if false == kList:IsNil() then local kItem = kList:ListFirstItem() if false == kItem:IsNil() then SetJobSkillFilterSize(kSelf, kList, kItem) end end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local bCheck = UISelf:GetCheckState() if true == bCheck then JobSkillItem3_FilterOnlyLearn(false) else JobSkillItem3_FilterOnlyLearn(true) end JobSkillItem3_ShowSelectItemList()

ICON.SCRIPT: if true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() then if true == AutoInsertItem() then SoulTrans_IconAni("FRM_RESOURCE_ANI", true) if false == IsSoulInsertUI() then if true == SetExtractitem() then SoulTrans_IconAni("FRM_DEST_ANI", true) SetSoulTrans_ResultItem() end end SetSoulTransText() end end

if true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() then UISelf:ClearCustomData() SoulTrans_IconAni("FRM_RESOURCE_ANI", false) local kDestItem = UISelf:GetParent():GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_DEST_ITEM") if false == kDestItem:IsNil() then local kDestIcon = kDestItem:GetControl("Icon") if false == kDestIcon:IsNil() then kDestIcon:ClearCustomData() SoulTrans_IconAni("FRM_DEST_ANI", false) end end if true == IsSoulInsertUI() then SetAdditionItem() PreChangeInvViewGroupTop(2) end SetSoulTrans_ResultItem() SetSoulTransText() end
if true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() and true == IsSoulInsertUI() then if true == AutoInsertItem() then SoulTrans_IconAni("FRM_DEST_ANI", true) SetSoulTrans_ResultItem() SetAdditionItem() end end

if true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() and true == IsSoulInsertUI() then UISelf:ClearCustomData() SoulTrans_IconAni("FRM_DEST_ANI", false) SetSoulTrans_ResultItem() SetSoulTransText() SetAdditionItem() end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() then DelInsuranceItem() end
if true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() then AddInsuranceItem() end
if true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() then DelRateUpItem() end
if true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() then AddRateUpItem() end

if true == CanStartSoulTransProgress() and true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() then if true == IsSoulInsertUI() then if false == IsHaveRarity() then local kPacket = NewPacket() CallCommonMsgYesNoBox(GetTT(799876):GetStr(), kPacket, true, 74) DeletePacket(kPacket) elseif false == UseInsuranceItem() then local kPacket = NewPacket() CallCommonMsgYesNoBox(GetTT(799877):GetStr(), kPacket, true, 76) DeletePacket(kPacket) else StartSoulTransProgress(4.0) end else StartSoulTransProgress(4.0) end else SetAdditionItem() end
BUTTON.HOTKEY: if true == CanStartSoulTransProgress() and true == IsEndSoulTransProgress() then if true == IsSoulInsertUI() then if false == IsHaveRarity() then local kPacket = NewPacket() CallCommonMsgYesNoBox(GetTT(799876):GetStr(), kPacket, true, 74) DeletePacket(kPacket) elseif false == UseInsuranceItem() then local kPacket = NewPacket() CallCommonMsgYesNoBox(GetTT(799877):GetStr(), kPacket, true, 76) DeletePacket(kPacket) else StartSoulTransProgress(4.0) end else StartSoulTransProgress(4.0) end else SetAdditionItem() end return true

FORM.SCRIPT:
local UIPos = UISelf:GetLocation() UISelf:SetLocation(Point2(UIPos:GetX(), GetScreenSize():GetY()-130 ));
local kAliveTime = 3000 UISelf:SetAliveTime( kAliveTime )
